All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ClientHandler
The ClientHandler class manages communication with a client on the server side.
Config
Configuration class for loading settings from a properties file.
ConnectController
Controller class for handling the connection-related functionality of the client application.
ConnectionHandler
The ConnectionHandler class manages the communication with the server.
LoginController
Controller class for handling user login functionality.
Main
The main class that serves as the entry point for the client application.
Main
The Main class is the entry point for the eDziennikFX application.
Packet
The Packet class represents a packet for communication between the client and server.
PacketType
Enumeration representing different types of packets for communication between the client and server.
Query
The Query class provides basic CRUD operations on a database using JDBC.
QueryTools
 
SelectGradeController
Controller class for selecting grades in the client application.
SelectStudentController
Controller class for selecting students in the client application.
Server
The Server class listens for incoming client connections and handles them using a ClientHandler.
User
The User class represents a user in the application.
